name: The Bratz App
description:
Wanna hang with the Bratz?

Head to the Create-It-Yourself (CIY) Shoppe in the Bratz app, where you can design anything you dream up.

In the CIY Shoppe, you’ll be able to customize fashions, snap pictures, create your very own Bratz and watch videos.

So what’s stopping you? It’s time to get making. It’s time to be a Bratz.

And be sure to check back in the app often. More fun games, videos and challenges are coming soon!
